properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , BIRTHDATE , PHONE , EMAIL , GENDER , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , ZODIAC FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , BIRTHDATE , PHONE , EMAIL , GENDER , ZODIAC ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD =?
